content: Bank Account Asked by Nicholas ChanAsked on 07 Oct 2018What is the cheapest way to transfer SGD from a SG bank to USD in another SG bank?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Consider dbs multi currency account. You can convert from sgd to usd at anytime you wish. If you really need the usd account to be in another bank other than dbs, not much choices actually. FAST transfer will not work as it can only be done in sgd.. If the bank where your usd is in does not have a high commission charge for accepting physical deposits in USD, can consider changing at a money changer and deposit 2 comments0
Nicholas Chan07 Oct 2018Are that sg banks that don't charge for over the counter usd deposits? Jonathan Chia Guangrong07 Oct 2018Dbs charges 1.5% for this service. Not sure about other banks
